pageContext.claim: “The Democrats want to significantly raise your taxes. Essentially, they want to impose socialism, Venezuela, dismantle law enforcement and eliminate our borders.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a nonsense fear tactic. Trump's claim originates with the Democrats who have embraced some socialist policies. While Venezuela is governed by socialist leaders, it's status as an increasingly failed state follows years of dictatorship and economic mismanagement, not simply a few socialist policies.
